Setting.Name: PrimarySecondary::DynamicField
Setting.Description: Defines dynamic field name for primary ticket feature.

Setting.Name: PrimarySecondary::AdvancedEnabled
Setting.Description: Enables the advanced PrimarySecondary part of the feature.

Setting.Name: PrimarySecondary::UnsetPrimarySecondary
Setting.Description: Enables the feature to unset the PrimarySecondary state of a ticket in the advanced PrimarySecondary mode.

Setting.Name: PrimarySecondary::UpdatePrimarySecondary
Setting.Description: Enables the feature to change the PrimarySecondary state of a ticket in the advanced PrimarySecondary mode.

Setting.Name: PrimarySecondary::FollowUpdatedPrimary
Setting.Description: Enables the feature that secondary tickets follow the primary ticket to a new primary in the advanced PrimarySecondary mode.

Setting.Name: PrimarySecondary::ForwardSecondary
Setting.Description: Enables the feature to forward articles from type 'forward' of a primary ticket to the customers of the secondary tickets. By default (disabled) it will not forward articles from type 'forward' to the secondary tickets.

Setting.Name: PrimarySecondary::KeepParentChildAfterUnset
Setting.Description: Enables the feature to keep parent-child link after unset of the PrimarySecondary state in the advanced PrimarySecondary mode.

Setting.Name: PrimarySecondary::KeepParentChildAfterUpdate
Setting.Description: Enables the feature to keep parent-child link after change of the PrimarySecondary state in the advanced PrimarySecondary mode.

Setting.Name: Ticket::EventModulePost###PrimarySecondary
Setting.Description: Registration of the ticket event module.

Setting.Name: PreApplicationModule###AgentPrePrimarySecondary
Setting.Description: This module activates Primary/Secondary field in new email and phone ticket screens.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentTicketPrimarySecondary
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Loader::Module::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###004-ZnunyPrimarySecondary
Setting.Description: Loader module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Navigation###AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###004-ZnunyPrimarySecondary
Setting.Description: Main menu item registration.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::MenuModule###480-PrimarySecondary
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to change the PrimarySecondary status of a ticket in the ticket zoom view of the agent interface.

Hash.Item: Change the PrimarySecondary state of the ticket.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###Permission
Setting.Description: Required permissions to use the ticket PrimarySecondary screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###RequiredLock
Setting.Description: Defines if a ticket lock is required in the ticket PrimarySecondary screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface (if the ticket isn't locked yet, the ticket gets locked and the current agent will be set automatically as its owner).

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###TicketType
Setting.Description: Sets the ticket type in the ticket PrimarySecondary screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface (Ticket::Type needs to be activated).

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###Service
Setting.Description: Sets the service in the ticket PrimarySecondary screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface (Ticket::Service needs to be activated).

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###Owner
Setting.Description: Sets the ticket owner in the ticket PrimarySecondary screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###OwnerMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if ticket owner must be selected by the agent.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###Responsible
Setting.Description: Sets the responsible agent of the ticket in the ticket PrimarySecondary screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###ResponsibleMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if ticket responsible must be selected by the agent.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###State
Setting.Description: If a note is added by an agent, sets the state of the ticket in the ticket PrimarySecondary screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###StateType
Setting.Description: Defines the next state of a ticket after adding a note, in the ticket PrimarySecondary screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###StateDefault
Setting.Description: Defines the default next state of a ticket after adding a note, in the ticket PrimarySecondary screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###Note
Setting.Description: Allows adding notes in the ticket PrimarySecondary screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###NoteMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if note must be filled in by the agent. Can be overwritten by Ticket::Frontend::NeedAccountedTime.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###Subject
Setting.Description: Sets the default subject for notes added in the ticket PrimarySecondary screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###Body
Setting.Description: Sets the default body text for notes added in the ticket PrimarySecondary screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###RichTextWidth
Setting.Description: Defines the width for the rich text editor component for this screen. Enter number (pixels) or percent value (relative).

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###RichTextHeight
Setting.Description: Defines the height for the rich text editor component for this screen. Enter number (pixels) or percent value (relative).

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###InvolvedAgent
Setting.Description: Shows a list of all the involved agents on this ticket, in the ticket PrimarySecondary screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###InformAgent
Setting.Description: Shows a list of all the possible agents (all agents with note permissions on the queue/ticket) to determine who should be informed about this note, in the ticket PrimarySecondary screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###IsVisibleForCustomerDefault
Setting.Description: Defines if the PrimarySecondary note is visible for the customer by default.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###Priority
Setting.Description: Shows the ticket priority options in the ticket PrimarySecondary screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###PriorityDefault
Setting.Description: Defines the default ticket priority in the ticket PrimarySecondary screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###Title
Setting.Description: Shows the title field in the ticket PrimarySecondary screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###HistoryType
Setting.Description: Defines the history type for the ticket PrimarySecondary screen action, which gets used for ticket history in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###HistoryComment
Setting.Description: Defines the history comment for the ticket PrimarySecondary screen action, which gets used for ticket history in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPrimarySecondary###PrimarySecondaryMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if Primary / Secondary field must be selected by the agent.

Setting.Name: DashboardBackend###0900-TicketPrimary
Setting.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the primary tickets overview of the agent interface. "Limit" is the number of entries shown by default. "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

Setting.Name: DashboardBackend###0910-TicketSecondary
Setting.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the secondary tickets overview of the agent interface. "Limit" is the number of entries shown by default. "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

Setting.Name: ReplaceCustomerRealNameOnSecondaryArticleTypes
Setting.Description: This setting is deprecated and will be removed in further versions of ZnunyPrimarySecondary.

Setting.Name: ReplaceCustomerRealNameOnSecondaryArticleCommunicationChannels
Setting.Description: Specifies the different article communication channels where the real name from Primary ticket will be replaced with the one in the Secondary ticket.

Setting.Name: ACLKeysLevel3::Actions###888-ZnunyPrimarySecondary
Setting.Description: Defines which items are available for 'Action' in third level of the ACL structure.

Setting.Name: DynamicFields::Driver###PrimarySecondary
Setting.Description: DynamicField backend registration.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Module###AdminDynamicFieldPrimarySecondary
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Loader::Module::AdminDynamicFieldPrimarySecondary###004-ZnunyPrimarySecondary
Setting.Description: Loader module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Navigation###AdminDynamicFieldPrimarySecondary###004-ZnunyPrimarySecondary
Setting.Description: Main menu item registration.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::BulkModule###010-PrimarySecondary
Setting.Description: PrimarySecondary module for Ticket Bulk feature.
